page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT. A survey of primary school children about their parents' employment in the locality showed:{FATHERS-}5 Phurnacite workers,4 factory workers,4 Unemployed 3 Teachers,2 Engineers,2 Post Office workers,1 lorry driver,1 Chiropodist, 1 Policeman,1 Fireman,1 Civil engineer 1 Self-employed businessman,1 Club steward,1 Barrister,1 Electrician,1 Health Inspector. {MOTHERS-}15 House- wives,2 Teachers,2 School dinner supervisors,1 Social Worker,1 Nursery Assistant,1 Matron,1 Nurse,1 Shopkeeper,1 Club Stewardess,1 School Caretaker,1 Bingo Club Checker,1 Products Surveyor,1 Cleaner,1 Store Checkout Assistant.
